channel.title: Dumping all Item ID Info
channel.description:
I've been trying to dump all the info (zoom, model #s, etc.) for every single item. (So it goes by item, not model number.)
But whenever I dump it, I get the same thing for each item. How can I refresh or update the dumper before I dump for the next item so it will list the [i]correct[/i] info for the item. There's gotta be a "Equipped Weapon" int somewhere that I can possibly change to my liking then dump. Does anybody know how?
-TeleNubby

item.title: Dumping all Item ID Info
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

eclipse245:

It’s already been dumped…if not by u then by MrQuarter…

I need to dump it myself so it will be compatible with my upcoming java project. And I didn’t ask this question to get an answer that I already knew.

Read full topic
